summary: An Ordinance accepting a quit claim deed from the Klatawa Investment Company, dated July 26, 1909, to the following described property, to-wit: Beginning at a point on the north line of lot eighteen (18), block twenty-four (24), Pontius Fourth Addition to the City of Seattle, said point being thirty-four and seventeen one-hundredths (34.17) feet easterly from the Northwest corner of said lot; thence on the arc of a curve to the right of uniform radius of ten (10) feet, a distance of twenty-two and ninety-three one-hundredths (22.93) feet to a point on the northerly margin of Stewart Street, as extended by Ordinance No. 14881 of the City of Seattle; thence in a northeasterly direction along the northerly margin of said Stewart Street, a distance of twenty-two and thirteen hundredth (22.13) feet to the north line of said lot eighteen (18); thence westerly along the north line of said lot eighteen (18) a distance of twenty-two and thirteen one-hundredths (22.13) feet to the point of beginning, compromising one hundred six and sixty one-hundredths (106.60) square feet
